papers.title: CsK2Sb Photocathode Development for BERLinPro
authors: In order to generate high brightness and high-current electron beams for BERLinPro

an SRF photoinjector is being developed at HZB. Normal conducting CsK2Sb cathodes will be used due to their high QE at visible wavelengths and fast response time. We report on the commissioning of a preparation and analysis system that allows investigation of the surface and bulk chemical composition of the cathodes using XPS and ion scattering. In addition
the design of an UHV transport system for cathodes is presented.

papers.title: Development of a Multialkali Photocathode Preparation System
papers.abstract: We have developed a multialkali photocathode preparation system at JAEA for high current operation of DC photoemission gun. The system will be connected to a 250 kV – 50 mA gun for beam generation test. The status of development will be presented. reference for this paper ※ DOI:10.18429/JACoW-ERL2015-
